item.description:
Meetup for Goods....sell hard is this Friday at the Boston Common Theater meetup at 9:45PM Bonus - The meetup for "Spread" in havard square at 7:20!!! Great weekend for Movies!

item.name: GOODS, live hard, Sell hard this Friday at Boston Common Theater meet at 9:45
